snippet.title: Spacelords - Alien Myths Campaign Trailer
snippet.description:
RAIDERS OF THE BROKEN PLANET is now SPACELORDS!
https://spacelordsthegame.com/news/raiders-of-the-broken-planet-reborns-as-spacelords

---

Alien Myths is a premium stand alone campaign for Raiders of the Broken Planet; an intense adventure of 4 challenging missions. Harec's must find the legendary Protectors, but he needs old flame Shae in order to do it. She won't trust him after how things ended last time. Ironic that the future of the Broken Planet depends on two broken hearts...


---

Learn more about Spacelords: https://spacelordsthegame.com/
